content.rendered:
Are you looking Steel Staircase for your house or your business? Then Big Ferro is the best choice for you.

Call us
Send a message

BIG FERRO IS UK NUMBER ONE SPECIALIST IN METAL FABRICATION.

We offer a wide array of standard designs options, in addition we can provide bespoke designs to meet individual specifications. From simple fire escapes to complicated metal spiral staircases, our products are constructed to the highest standards.

Free consultation
onsite

Affordable
price

30 years
of expertise

High quality
service

Big Ferro Creations Showcase gallery

info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857
info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857

Internal and external staircases

Steel staircases

The design, build and installation of a steel staircase needs’ expert precision and craftsmanship to guarantee a project’s unique specifications are met. We can deliver a limitless range of solutions, style and unique design alternatives. We can work with a range of metal treads, incorporating glass and stainless steel for that ultra-modern feel. Our Steel Staircases are manufactured for indoor and outdoor uses.

Basic metal staircases

A simple staircase can be as straightforward as one single flight with handrails or balustrades to the open side. For such instances, all we really need to know is the height that the stair rises in order to quote a functional system.

Metal stair railings

Metal balusters (handrail guarding) are available in a variety of finishes and designs, suitable for both contemporary and traditional staircase designs.

Commercial staircases

We can guarantee the highest level of design consistency across a comprehensive selection of products. Big Ferro can deliver practical, commercial solutions with the strength, versatility and beauty of metal. We will work with you on your project to produce a staircase in a wide choice of finish to the highest quality.

Staircase restoration and repair

We offer professional service, covering all aspects of metal refurbishment and restoration of metal stairs, stair railings and balustrades.

Big Ferro Creations Showcase gallery

Contact Us to get an estimate

Gates, Railings & Stairs    |    Bespoke metalwork services    |    Maintenance    |    Mobile Welding    |    Powder Coating    |    Automation   |    Shot Blasting
